title: Any ex-interns of isfcr
content: Is it paid or unpaid ? And how much hours per day did u work ..

comments.body: 8 hours per week, it was offline, and unpaid. moreover it was considered as special topic at the end, they scammed us, fuck ISFCR man
Unpaid, they have reporting time and exiting time and all, they will make you sit from 9 till 5
yes, and moreover research is shit in these centeres
Bro moreover those ppl forced for mandatory research paper, I walked out of tat shitty place as they said that.
Same, but I decided to stay , biggest blunder

I did this "internship" in the summer after my 4th sem, they expect you to show up literally 9 to 5 for like 6 weeks from I think second week to June. 

It's not bad if you have a good teammate and a decent mentor who can guide you through your project and writing research paper, if not it'll be the worst experience ever. 

One good thing that came out of this for me, is that they added the 2 internship credits (S grade) to my sem 5 sgpa which helped me out a lot.
